div.p: System of reckoning time, such as Gregorian calendar or Julian calendar.
Suggested values include, but are not limited to, "gregorian" and "julian". Available in date, fromDate, toDate.
Suggested values include, but are not limited to, "gregorian" and "julian". Available in date, fromDate, toDate, unitDate, unitDateStructured.

div.egXML: <dateRange> <fromDate calendar="gregorian" certainty="approximate" era="ce" standardDate="1950"> 1950 </fromDate> <toDate calendar="gregorian" certainty="approximate" era="ce" standardDate="2000"> 2000 </toDate> </dateRange>
